possible_actions: disinfect stethoscope: if the disinfectant wipe is laying on or close to the stethoscope, the stethoscope was disinfected
put on face mask: if the lid of the face mask box is fully opened and does not cover the opening at all, the face mask was put on
put on gloves: if the gloves are laying on the counter, the gloves were put on
discard gloves in trash: if the gloves are laying on the trash can, the gloves were discarded in the trash
put on gown: if the gown is laying on the counter, the gown was put on

disinfect hands: if the hand sanitizer is brought closer to the camera (appears larger), the hands were disinfected. Take into account the whole series of images regarding the movement of the hand sanitizer.
dry hands: if the paper towel is laying on the counter, the hands were dried
put paper towel on sink handle: if the paper towel is wrapped around the sink handle, the paper towel was put on the sink handle
turn on sink and wash hands using soap: if a water stream is visible, the sink handle was turned on and hands were washed with soap
turn off sink: if no water stream is visible anymore, the sink handle was turned off
put on n95 mask: if the n95 mask is laying on the counter, the n95 mask was put on
put on face shield: if the face shield is brought closer to the camera, the face shield is put on
